title: User Profile Settings Management
description: As a registered user, I want to manage my profile settings so that I can customize my account preferences and maintain accurate personal information.

acceptanceCriteria.description: User can view current profile information including name, email, and preferences
User can edit and save profile fields with validation feedback
User receives confirmation when profile changes are successfully saved
User can reset password through profile settings with email verification

tasks.description: Implement profile data model and validation
